panels.description: Bruce will be showing a documentary about his time on the power ranger sets.

panels.description: Presenting a brief overview of the origins behind the Sentai franchise and Spider-Man along with how it revolutionized the Tokusatsu genre with the likes of giant robots.

panels.description: Come hear from the cast and creators of Ancient Warriors: Legacies of Olympus, talking about out experience with voice acting, what it was like going from an audio series to live action and a very exciting announcement.

panels.panel: The Johnny Yong Bosch and Jason Narvy Panel
panels.description: At this panel, you will get an exclusive look at a few of their short films and hear all about their latest projects straight from the source. These days they are busy making waves in the film industry with their new production company, VOX ROCKET STUDIO. Plus, do not miss a sneak peek at their upcoming feature film, Spades - which because they are overachievers also comes with its very own comic book! There will bring PRIZES and FREE GIVEAWAYS!
panels.participants: Johnny Yong Bosch, Jason Narvy
